channel.title: Runecrafting
channel.description: i want to make a runecrafting altar that gives all of the runes but idk how to do it so can someone give me a code to put in please.

item.title: Runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“Xalaq, post:3, topic:104563”][quote author=nov9862 link=topic=149604.msg1418317#msg1418317 date=1180812078]
Search for

 public void NewObjects() {

Then add

AddGlobalObj(####, ####, 409, 1, 10);

The #### are the X + Y coords.

Then you search for

case 409

If you dont have one. add a case anywhere but makesure you dont put it inside of another case.
This is the code to add if you dont already have

case 409: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You start praying.."); addSkillXP((6067*playerLevel[5]), 5); <-----This is Amount of skil you want them to get addItem(4832, 1); <------This is how they get an item. copy and paste this under it to add more runes setAnimation(1979); actionTimer = 15; sendMessage("PUT YOUR MESSAGE IN HERE"); } break;
[/quote]

He might need to do -Fedexer-'s tut on add global object looking at the code you gave him[/quote]

if youve aready got theglobal object tut use what ever rc alter you want and id be pretty sure that you could do cases =/.

Read full topic

item.title: Runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

True. But most sources that are downloadable already have this done. If not he wont find what i told him to search for so he cant mess anything up.

Read full topic

item.description:
@urballsrmine wrote:

i already have global objects. thanks man
